item.description:
REGISTRATION IS REQUIRED HERE: http://ctdevstartup3.eventbrite.com/

Connecticut Software Developer Startups (CTDEVSTARTUP) is a group for software developers who are interested in launching or growing their startup company. The next event is on Monday April 15th 2013 5:30-8:30PM at the Microsoft Farmington office.

Special presentation by Eric Zeiberg (iSpeak4U) - mobile app for speech disabilities.Eric is a 12-year old student who was recently honored by the Governor & Legislature of the State of Connecticut -http://www.ispeak4u.com/connecticut-general-assembly.html

Presentations:
The Lean Startup Process for Mobile Apps - Bob Familiar (Microsoft)
Mobile Healthcare Startup - Applivate - John Fitzpatrick (CEO Applivate)

Event details & required registration -
http://ctdevstartup3.eventbrite.com/

Event to be held at the Microsoft Farmington CT office.
item.name: CTDEVSTARTUP: April 15 Meeting - Lean Startup Process & Mobile Apps
